contents.title: Blankit
contents.description: Hello! My name is Blankit, I am a competitive Splatoon 2 player. I'm an anchor(mostly Splatlings) player, but I can flex to midline weapons too. I've been playing Splatoon since it was on the Wii U and have been on many teams. Aside from Splatoon, I do enjoy playing other games for the Nintendo Switch, like Mario Kart 8 Deluxe.I'm a big animal lover (so show me your pet pics!) and I've been playing music for some time now, I mostly play Piano and Kalimba. I'm always open to chat and meeting new Splatoon peeps any time so don't be afraid to shoot me a DM  \o/

contents.title: Devvy
contents.description: Hey all! I am a 23 year old girl from the Canadian prairies. I am the captain and backline for the West Broadway Grillers since December 2018 when the comp team was formed. The Grillers clan however, did originate a year earlier when me and my local friends were just casual players at the time. I've taken 3 years of college to work my way into Journalism. While I wait to get accepted into the main course, I am taking an Office Administration course. Another thing about me is that I name my main weapons. For example Steve (Heavy Splatling) & Hugo (Hydra).

contents.title: Shads
contents.description: Proud sniper for Inkvaders, Low Ink participant, and volunteer staff member when the team doesn't play. Aside from competitive Splatoon, I like to create art, play Pokemon games, and write stories. Currently I'm studying computer science, and would one day like to work for the CIA or FBI. I help out with coding things around here. I'm also a prolific confetti thrower in Twitch stream chats and on discord throws confetti🎉

contents.title: starbiit
contents.description: Hihi! I am an artist and animator who has been playing the squid game competitively since 2017. I never made it to the top, but my friends and teammates have showed me the amazing things that the community can bring. As a shy person, I want to help bring that welcoming experience to new players!

contents.title: KitsuneKeira
contents.description: Esports Organizer, Computer Engineer and Full-Time Kitsune. I'm scared of using anything that doesn't have Ink Armor attached to it. In my free time I staff various esports events, including a long history in the collegiate esports scene. Working to grow Splatoon in all its forms!

contents.title: .jpg
contents.description: Wanting to branch out in the splatoon community, I became a staff for low ink. Since then, I've really taken a liking to helping out newer and lower level teams. While I don't really play much Splatoon these days, I still love giving teams help and being a role model for them.

contents.title: Totorobot
contents.description: Incapable of playing anything other than N-ZAP. Competitive coordinator for Triton Splatoon at UC San Diego - enthusiastic about building up the collegiate Splatoon scene!

contents.title: Para!!
contents.description: Hi I'm Para!! I like drawing, making games, and playing splat.If you ever have questions about anything feel free to ask! I'm happy to help ^^

contents.title: Kaloseii
contents.description: Hey, I’m Kalo! My goal is to help the competitive splatoon scene grow.

contents.title: gh0st
contents.description: gh0st | He/Him | I play Splatoon sometimes | gh0station#9213

contents.title: Frosch
contents.description: Ice cream.

contents.title: HoeenHero
contents.description: I'm Founder and Head Organizer for Low Ink and Inkling Performance Labs. I created Low Ink because I wanted to give newer and lower teams a place where they could learn, grow, and get tournament experience, as well as wanting to help the community grow. The same desire to grow the community created Inkling Performance Labs, and as an Organization Head I'll do my best to grow and improve this community.

contents.title: Kraken Mare
contents.description: Kraken Mare is a <strike>meme</strike> veteran of the Splat community, playing the game from the first Testfire and being in competitive since it's early days. KM has staffed for Low Ink for over two years and has staffed other tournaments going back to S1. Is obsessed with Ozei and the number 77.

contents.title: Skye
contents.description:
Ello' I'm Skye I like to draw, stream, make videos and play games!
I've been around in the community since January 2019, been in competitive since September 2019, & have been Staffing tournaments since March 2020.

Usually I tend to lurk but if you approach me i'll definitely be willing to talk, since I like meeting new people and making new friends!

♡Oh yea and I love working with the people in IPL that I get to work with at IPL♡
♡uwu♡

contents.title: Raze
contents.description: Current head TO for Testing Grounds. I have been a competitive player since Splatoon 1 competing at the highest level. I have been running/organizing tournaments since 2017. My goal is to make my event as easy as possible to compete in, and run them as smoothly as possible.

contents.title: Snek
contents.description: Former competitive player of Enlightenment, and former head TO of Squid Spawning Grounds, I am an avid supporter of the competitive scene that does his best to further the scene however i can, but when I'm not you can usually find me on Phantasy Star Online 2.

contents.title: Astro/Astrocities
contents.description: Former competitive comp Splatoon player, current commentator and TO.  I love long walks on the beach I guess?  Dunno what else goes in a bio...

contents.title: Vincent
contents.description: Hi there 👋 I'm Vincent. I'm the Technical Lead for IPL developing all the code based stuff you've seem, including this website. I study Computer Science at uni currently and on the side I'm a STEM ambassador, teaching kids on computers and code. Along with coding I help run Low Ink and numerous IRL events and conferences on the side.

contents.title: Ozei
contents.description: H-hello! I’m Ozei (oo-zz-ay) but I also go by Kin and Nymph. An Australian self taught artist, furry and gamer pangender/nonbinary (Any Pronouns) whose interests is games, art , anime and cartoons.also Kraken Mare is cutie y/y!!

contents.title: inkfarer
contents.description: I am Inkfarer - I do streaming and coding for IPL. I know a little bit of Japanese and I play a little bit of Splatoon. I have a neat website at inkfarer.com.

contents.title: LeptoFlare
contents.description:
Preemptively compensating for inadequacy. If you're curious who I am, check out my website!
lepto.tech

contents.title: Seagull
contents.description: Hey i'm seagull and i make podcast for Lowink. my main goal on Lowink is to teach people about splatoon 2.

contents.title: Cyo
contents.description: German Splatoon2-Streamer and Commentator for DSB (german LUTI) and Low Ink. Playing competitive on Division 4 Level (Season X). Won Low Ink 06/20 w/ Trick or Treat (Boo, Poke, Mevlin).Also plays other stuff like chess (i'm such a badsquib with my 700 ELO xD) and rl sports.

contents.title: Popgun
contents.description:
• Captain of Destiny Troops
  • Husband of Ms.Popgun
  • Commentator of Splatoon
  • Eater of food

contents.title: toxic
contents.description: I like video games and talking about video games. I just wanna make sure that I say words correctly and not mess up to much.  : )

contents.title: Vantox
contents.description: Hey i am Vantox and i am 15 Y/o and play Splatoon 2 CP myself and love to be Commentator^^

contents.title: Froppy♪
contents.description: A Competitive Splatoon 2 player who has been working from the bottom up. I don't get lucky, I earn everything that has come my way. I coach, help, and play with the lower level competitive community a lot.

contents.title: Leaf
contents.description: 20/former X div comp player and TO for low ink.
